definition: to examine oneself/to reflect on one's shortcomings/introspection/self-awareness/self-criticism
to compare oneself/to view oneself as
to make an effort/to push for sth/to work hard
to rouse to vigorous action/energetic mood
to encourage/to urge/to impel/to spur sb on
to find some consolation (idiom)/to find relief in
to guard against pride and impatience (idiom); to remain modest and keep cool
to preserve a proper behavior in private life
to work energetically for prosperity (of the country)
